item.title: ET
item.description: score:-77 Chances: Energy Transfer LP continues to increase unitholders’ value as its board of directors approves a 0.8% quarterly distribution rate. The S&P 500 concluded 2023 on a positive note, which bodes well for the stock market as a whole. Risks: Congressional backers of Energy Transfer LPâ€™s Dakota Access Pipeline are warning against potential shutdown, posing regulatory risk for the company.

item.title: CNM
item.description: score:-11 Chances: Core & Main, Inc. has seen substantial growth in its share price, with over a 100% increase this year. The company has announced multiple acquisitions and agreements to expand its product offerings and market reach. Institutions have substantial holdings in Core & Main, indicating significant influence over the company’s direction and performance.
